renderedFields.description:
Hello Umair,

Please set up Zendesk access for Kara Bates [kbates@digitalremedy.com], Sr. Manager AdOps, who will join Jeff Barry’s team.

If needed so that this user has access to Sinclair SSO and MS suite, then she has [kbates@sbgtv.com]

Kindly note that all outlook [@sbgtv.com] is now forwarded to the new google gmail [@digitalremedy.com].

Thanks,

Joanna
